Name: Witches with the Enemy: A Novel of the Mist-Torn Witches

ReviewList.Text: Third in the series this story held my attention right from the beginning. I have enjoyed this series so much that I am already looking forward to the next.  I could not put this book down.
Another great adventure with Celine and Amelie.  The book was delightful and a quick read  (it was over too fast)

The writing was good and the story was good.  The reason I am only giving it three stars is because it did not feel like a full novel, more like filler or a short story that is long ( if that makes sense).  I love the sisters stories and wait for them so it was a bit of a let down.  Also, the " who is going to inheret" is getting dragged on.  I will keep reading the stories but really hope the next has more substance.  For a lazy afternoon read it is not bad.
